is a little hamlet situated in one of the most beautiful hill forests in the

.
Situated in the densest of forests, it is far from the madding crowd. Electricity and hence disturbing elements like the TV etc., cannot be found here. It only pure nature.
The light of civilisation is yet to touch and spoil the nature here, though hospitality from the 4/5 families that resides here is overwhelming and natural.

has shown this place in their tourist map since August 2007. The result of a forestation project by WDFDC. Roaming in the Jungles here reveals how much effort has been put in to give back Earth one of its lost possessions, the forest. Among the dense forest, a very small portion of land has been cleared to accommodate you and your family only.
